body: Thank God for multi-tagging search I was able to find this Gem. Definitely going to my bookmarks. Also to the comment section yapping about lolis and children. We are all marked as lolicons the moment you clicked on this doujin. Because why the hell are you here anyway other than fapping to these types of mangas? Anyway, lolis aren't usually my cup of tea but the group + continuous creampies are my jam. 10/10
Ngl I didn't fap to this because it's wholesome

@XenMaster220 the word children referrers to multiple persons, not one in particular, so it makes sense that they wouldn't have a specific child in mind when they say that. And lolis are a representation of children, not crocodiles or old men or rusted lawn furniture but children. They both look and act similar enough to children that there can be no honest denial of that being what they represent and there's nothing wrong with that as a representation does not equal a real person!
this was really wholesome, straight to my favourites
People say lolis are representation of children. They also can’t seem to point out which child it’s representative of. It’s honestly amusing.
usually hate shota but this was kinda wholesome, i allow it

This is some good loli-shotas groupie
😗👌
I loved this anime, good old days. Fuck the day anime became a trend.

body: @I-Heart-Hanabi I agree because i tested my iq last month and it was 150+iq who knows maybe my brain grew bigger, that's why we are correct because we have a brain that thinks logically and not morality and mentally like some pussy crying over an art that is designed to pleasure you, like tell me where are the children that we have hurt pleasuring our lonely lives because of dumb people, by the way we smart people still has emotions we just think logically more.
